title: Air Fryer Tilapia with Fresh Lemon Pepper

Ingredients.9: 1 sprig parsley, chopped, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 3 minutes.

Directions.2: While fryer is preheating, rinse tilapia fillets and pat dry with a paper towel.

Directions.3: Combine lemon zest, olive oil, pepper, salt, and garlic in a bowl. Rub spice mixture over the tilapia. Sprinkle lightly with paprika. Spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray and place the filets inside, coated side up.

Directions.4: Air fry until fish can be flaked with a fork, 7 to 10 minutes. Do not crowd the fish filets; you may need to fry a second batch, depending on the size of your air fryer.

Directions.5: Remove tilapia to a plate, garnish with chopped parsley, and serve with lemon wedges.
